data.comment: The big names in today's match at Wanda Metropolitano have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Atletico push upfield but Pablo Gonzales Fuertes quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick Atletico.
Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valladolid's half?
In the minute 4, Atletico's Angel Correa is on target but unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Valladolid.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Atletico.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Valladolid.
In the minute 12, Valladolid to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
Valladolid's Ruben Alcaraz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Atletico a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Atletico throw-in in Valladolid's half.
Free kick for Atletico in the half of Valladolid.
Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Valladolid in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
In the minute 19, Valladolid drives forward and Oscar Plano gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Atletico push forward at Wanda Metropolitano and Thomas Lemar gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Valladolid defence.
Atletico are pushing forward but Luis Suarez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 21, Valladolid have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Valladolid.
Goal kick for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Stefan Savic for Atletico has been booked by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes and receives a first yellow card.
Valladolid's Oscar Plano gets in a shot on goal at Wanda Metropolitano. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 28, Valladolid's Pablo Hervias misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
Marcos De Sousa of Valladolid smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 30, Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Valladolid throw-in in Atletico's half.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Atletico have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Valladolid at Wanda Metropolitano.
Goal kick for Valladolid at Wanda Metropolitano.
Important block from the Valladolid defence as Luis Suarez fires in a strike for Atletico.
In the minute 36, At Wanda Metropolitano, Atletico are penalized for being offside.
In Madrid Valladolid attack through Kike Perez. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Wanda Metropolitano, Vitolo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Atletico.
In the minute 42, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Atletico a goal kick.
Valladolid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Valladolid capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
In the minute 44, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
In Madrid Valladolid attack through Roque Mesa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Free kick for Valladolid in the half of Atletico.
Atletico drive upfield and Luis Suarez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Valladolid defender.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Madrid.
Mario Hermoso of Atletico gets in a strike, but is off target.
Valladolid have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Valladolid's Marcos De Sousa breaks free at Wanda Metropolitano. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Atletico have a goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
Diego Simeone is making the team's first substitution at Wanda Metropolitano with Marcos Llorente replacing Vitolo.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Atletico.
In the minute 46, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Atletico a goal kick.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Valladolid a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
In Madrid, Atletico push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Atletico a goal kick.
Free kick Valladolid.
In the minute 48, Luis Suarez (Atletico) has received a yellow card from Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 49, Valladolid's Saidy Janko gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Atletico defender.
Oscar Plano for Valladolid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
In the minute 50, Atletico are in shooting range from this free kick.
Corner awarded to Valladolid.
Javi Sanchez (Valladolid) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Valladolid at Wanda Metropolitano.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Atletico's Luis Suarez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 54, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Valladolid a goal kick.
Throw-in Atletico.
Thomas Lemar puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 56, Great play from Kieran Trippier to set up the goal.
Joao Felix is replacing Saul Niguez for the home team.
Diego Simeone (Atletico) is making a third substitution, with Koke replacing Angel Correa.
In the minute 59, Atletico pushes forward through Luis Suarez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Valladolid have a goal kick.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
In the minute 62, Toni Villa is replacing Jota for Valladolid at Wanda Metropolitano.
Shon Weissman is on a sub for Kike Perez for Valladolid.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Valladolid.
In the minute 63, Atletico make their fourth substitution with Geoffrey Kondogbia replacing Luis Suarez.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Valladolid at Wanda Metropolitano.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
Corner awarded to Valladolid.
In the minute 71, In Madrid, Geoffrey Kondogbia (Atletico) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
In the minute 72, Goal! Marcos Llorente extends Atletico's lead to 2-0.
Kieran Trippier instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in Valladolid.
In the minute 74, The away team replace Nacho Martinez with Michel Herrero.
The away team have replaced Pablo Hervias with Saidy Janko. This is the fourth substitution made today by Sergio.
The home team have replaced Thomas Lemar with Lucas Torreira. This is the fifth substitution made today by Diego Simeone.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Valladolid.
Hector Herrera of Atletico gets in a strike, but is off target.
Roque Mesa is booked for the away team.
In the minute 81, Valladolid make their fifth substitution with Jawad El Yamiq replacing Javi Sanchez.
Hector Herrera (Atletico) gets a yellow card.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
